title: Should have just played ranked.
body:
Well, today was the day I do my resume runs.
As one usually does when lookin for a job, It was all fine and dandy untill I went to the last place on my list.
The female manager was so rude and impolite, just extremely toxic in general.
All I wanted was to hand up a resume, and she just flat out refused and in other words that she used.
Told me to "Fuck Off"

Man if I wanted this level of toxicity I would have played some SoloQ.
